cards.rules_text:
When this creature dies, you may sacrifice a creature.
Whenever a creature you control dies, you may pay {2}. If you do, return this creature from the graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Do this only once each turn.
Warriors you control have +1/+1.
When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, return target creature with a mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed creature’s power to the battlefield.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature and discard a card. Return target creature from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped [i](It cannot be the card you just discarded). [/i]Draw a card.

Mutate {2}{R}{R}
When this creature enters the battlefield or mutates, put X +1/+1 counters on all other creatures you control where X is its power.

Mutate {4}{R}
Whenever a creature you control mutates, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

First strike
Whenever this creature kills a creature in combat, untap all creatures you control and start another combat step after this one. Do this only once each turn.

Equipped creature is a demon and loses all other types. Each creature spell you cast has mutate if it targets the equipped creature. The mutate cost is equal to its mana cost.
Equip {1}

Creatures you control gain +0/+3 and have vigilance.
Creatures you control gain +3/+0 and have first strike while there are 3 or more wall counters on this artifact.
Creatures you control have indestructible while there are 6 or more wall counters on this artifact.
{3}: Put a wall counter on this artifact.
Deal 3 damage to any target and 2 damage to yourself. Draw a card.
Whenever this creature attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to up to one other target creature an opponent controls.

Trample
This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters on it. 
When this creature attacks, you may pay {1}. If you do, it fights target creature. If its power is greater than 4, it first gains indestructible until end of turn.

{T}:Add {U} or {R}.
[i]Raid[/i] – This enters tapped unless you have attacked this turn.
Unyielding [i](When this dies, you may pay {2}. If you do, return it to the battlefield tapped.)[/i]

cards.rules_text: When this battle enters, search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.rules_text2: When this creature enters, return target face-up creature card you own with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard and/or exile to the battlefield.

When this artifact enters, search your library for a basic land, reveal it, and put it in your hand. Then shuffle.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control gains +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 3 life.
When this battle enters, deal 3 damage to up to one target creature that attacked last turn and gain 3 life.
cards.rules_text2: When this creature enters, exile target creature with mana value 4 or less until this leaves the battlefield.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you attack, create a 4/4 white Demon creature token that enters tapped and attacking.
Whenever your opponents cast their second spell in a turn, create a 4/4 white Demon creature token.
Whenever a creature enters under your opponent’s control, this creature deals 1 damage to it for each creature that entered under their control this turn.
Destroy all blocking creatures.
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you cast this during combat, it also gains indestructible until end of turn. Draw a card.
Exile up to one target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, target creature you control gets +5/+5 and trample until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Draw a card.
When this battle enters, draw a card and discard a card. You may exile an instant or sorcery with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard. You may cast it this turn without paying its mana cost.
cards.rules_text2:
The second spell you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast.
{1}{U}: Return this to the battlefield transformed.

cards.rules_text: When this creature enters or dies, it deals damage equal to this creature’s power to any target.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies in combat, you may exile it from your graveyard. If you do, create a token copy of it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile up to one target creature card from your graveyard with power less than or equal to this creature’s power. You may cast it this turn.
When this battle enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.rules_text2: {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card.

cards.rules_text:
Choose one – 
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control.
• Creatures you control get hexproof until end of turn.
• Creatures you control get trample until end of turn.

Choose one – 
• Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
• Target opponent exiles a card from their hand.
• Target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

Choose one – 
• Destroy target tapped creature.
• Target creature gains +2/+0 and first strike until end of turn.
• Return target creature that died this turn from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped with a finality counter on it

Choose one – 
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}
• The owner of target creature with mana value 2 or less puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
• Target creature phases out.

Choose one – 
• Deal 2 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle.
• Deal 4 damage to target player.
• Target creature can’t block this turn.

Spirit pill {2}{G} [i]({2}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Target creature you control gains power and toughness equal to this creature’s until end of turn and fights up to one target creature you don’t control. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Scorching Phoenixfire deals 6 damage to target creature. If it dies, Scorching Phoenixfire deals 2 damage to up to one other target creature. [i](Both targets must be chosen when casting the spell)[/i]
Exile target creature or enchantment.

When this creature attacks, you may pay 3 life. If you do, other creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
Escape–BBRR, Exile five other card from your graveyard.
Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Deal 3 damage to all creatures.
II – Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them until end of turn.
III – Target creature you control gets +3/+0 and can’t be blocked this turn.

Whenever this creature attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, return target creature card with mana value less than or equal to this creature’s power from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.

Target creature you control gets ward {2} until end of turn. Draw a card.
[i]Qi circulation[/i] – If you cast another spell this turn, it gets hexproof instead.

Return target creature to its owner’s hand. If you have less than seven cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference.
[i]Qi circulation[/i] – If you cast another spell this turn, untap up to four lands.
Return target spell to its owner’s hand. If it was not the first spell that player had cast this turn, counter it instead.

Enchant player [i](they must be the defending player)[/i]
At the beginning of enchanted player’s upkeep, creatures they control with power 2 or less lose all abilities. Put a curse counter on this battle.
cards.rules_text2: Create X 2/2 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of curse counters on this battle as it transformed.

cards.rules_text:

At the beginning of enchanted player’s upkeep,  that player goads three creatures they control. Put a curse counter on this battle.
cards.rules_text2: Gain control of X target creatures until end of turn, where X is the number of curse counters on this battle as it transformed. They gain haste until end of turn. Untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

cards.special_text:
[+0]: Proliferate, then you may cast a spell with mana value equal to or less than this planeswalker’s loyalty without paying its mana cost.
[-2]: Create a 4/4 blue Elemental Bird creature token with flying.

cards.rules_text:
Convoke
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose and exile X nonland cards from among them. You may cast spells from among the exiled cards for as long as they remain exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast them.

First strike
Whenever an opponent loses 1 or more life during your turn, exile that many cards from the top of their library. You may cast the exiled cards this turn by sacrificing a number of creatures equal to the exiled card’s mana cost.

When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.
